game.name: Curvid Nurntine and the Black Vaccine
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 색상 대체, 음량 개별 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, 스테레오 사운드, 자막 옵션, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Curvid Nurntine and the Black Vaccine is a gritty cyber-noir point and click adventure. A degenerate private investigator, a missing girl and a suspiciously mandatory vaccine all coalesce in this unfathomably horrific conspiracy.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Curvid Nurntine and the Black Vaccine is a gritty cyber-noir point and click adventure. A degenerate private investigator, a missing girl and a suspiciously mandatory vaccine all coalesce in this unfathomably horrific conspiracy.
